item.description:
EVENT: A hike to view fall foliage from the tower and top of the Blue Hills. You have a choice of hiking 2 to 8 miles depending on leader and group consensus. Highest Elevation is 635. For details on the Park go to: http://www.mass.gov/d...

Trip Coordinators: Jeff and Mike
Bring: Raingear for just in case, food and water or drink for picnic lunch
Meet: In front of the Trailside Museum at 11 AM, 1904 Canton Ave, Milton and look for Jeff wearing a Mosaic Cap
RSVP: Required by Friday, October 1st. Contact Jeff or Miike for more details and please include a phone number for contact on the day of the event
Cost: Admisson is free, There is a $5 charge for nonpaid members
item.how_to_find_us: Send an RSVP and Jeff or Mike will get back to you

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Blue Hills Hike
